name: Kids Card Gamepack
description:
The perfect kid friendly card games for the whole family! Play Go Fish and Old Maid.

Go Fish: The object of Go Fish is to make “books”, four cards of the same value. At the end of the game, the player who has the most books is the winner.

Old Maid: Who will be left with the odd Queen and become the Old Maid? Played with a regular deck of 52 cards and 4 players.

Compete against the computer's AI players for a real challenge. Enjoy a soothing soundtrack and smooth animated gameplay. Includes detailed in-game rules and help. Classic card game fun for all ages!

Features:

* 2 Games in 1!
* Real Go Fish and Old Maid rules
* Play against the computer AI
* Fast animated play
* Detailed game rules included
* Soothing soundtrack

Compatibility:

* iPhone
* iPod Touch
* iPad

This game is best played on tablet devices.
